metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11536 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: When ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 processes a crafted file in convert, it can lead to a Memory Leak in the WriteJP2Image() function in coders/jp2.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0098-CVE-2017-11536-memory-leak-in-jp2-coder.patch in unstable not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
